
                            
                            <p>1、扫码领券 <br> 2、携程app，搜礼品卡，买600面额任我行电子卡(不要带“送礼”)，订单不付款 <br> 3、然后在支付宝搜索携程，按照上图路径支付宝小程序付款，实付570，可叠加其它银行优惠。 <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202501/14/174613dj3iz80gq3cigj6y.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202501/14/174613dj3iz80gq3cigj6y.jpg"> <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202501/14/174614ts7egxhssp3j4wmk.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202501/14/174614ts7egxhssp3j4wmk.jpg"> <br>  <br> </p><p class="pl">黄了&nbsp;&nbsp;你才发出来</p><p class="pl">没吧，我才付款的</p><p></p>
